title: Shailesh Vara – 2022 Comments Changing Support to Rishi Sunak in Conservative Leadership Contest
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Shailesh Vara, the Conservative MP for North West Cambridgeshire, on Twitter on 24 October 2022.
content:
With Boris Johnson out of the leadership race I will be supporting Rishi Sunak.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[UNCLOS]: United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea
  *[ASEAN]: Association of Southeast Asian Nations

Rishi led us as Chancellor through the pandemic and I believe he is now the right person to lead us in these difficult times.
